name: Tilt Defense
description:
Tilt Defense is a mobile tower defense with infinite runner aspects inspired by the party whacker.

Player use their phones accelerometer to tilt their phone in one direction and the other to block or destroy monsters that are chasing civilians. Be careful though because you can also hit civilians.

Goal

The objective of the game is to save as many civilians as possible until the time runs out. If you reach negative points by allowing monsters to reach the safe zone, you lose.
